name: ENPA Deletion Pipeline
description: A pipeline that can be used to delete data in Firestore

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: GCP project ID
parameters.helpText: Google Cloud Project Id where Firestore instance and Dataflow job lives.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.label: Start time
parameters.helpText: Start time in seconds of documents to process.

parameters.name: graceHoursBackwards
parameters.label: Grace period backwards
parameters.helpText: Hours to read backwards from startTime.

parameters.name: graceHoursForwards
parameters.label: Grace period forwards
parameters.helpText: Hours to read forward from startTime.

parameters.name: deleteBatchSize
parameters.label: Delete batch size
parameters.helpText: Batch size of Firestore batch deletes.
